Upload completed with errors: 0 succeeded, 2 failed.

Error Summary:

• FIELD_INTEGRITY_EXCEPTION (1 records)
  FIELD_INTEGRITY_EXCEPTION:Couldn’t save this price book entry. When an active price book entry is related to a product and a product selling model, the product and product selling model must be active.:--

To resolve field permission issues:
1. Check field-level security settings in Setup > Object Manager > [Object] > Fields & Relationships
2. Ensure your profile or permission set has 'Edit' access to these fields
3. For Revenue Cloud specific fields, ensure Revenue Cloud features are enabled
